name: DuoGlob
description:
You are a pair of blobs connected via a spring like substance. Use this to help you escape this strange abandoned lab.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Controls

Left click and drag to launch

Right click to cancel

M to mute music

N to mute sfx

Stuff I Used

Transition Shader: https://github.com/GDQuest/godot-demos/blob/master/2018/09-20-shaders/shaders/tr...

Outline Shader: https://gist.github.com/hiulit/5b8fbcd40be5437f42f76e8bd12b0280

Font: https://www.1001freefonts.com/rubik.font

Jump Sound: https://freesound.org/people/yottasounds/sounds/232135/

Land Sound: https://freesound.org/people/jjxmf/sounds/551449/

Switch Sound: https://freesound.org/people/soiboi/sounds/556823/

Music: Synapse by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com/free-music/synapse
